game.name: Grotesque Tactics 2 – Dungeons and Donuts
game.shortDescription: In this successor to the celebrated RPG-parody Grotesque Tactics, you will experience an ironic story-driven RPG with humorous dialogue-puzzles in the style of Monkey Island.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In this successor to the celebrated RPG-parody Grotesque Tactics, you will experience an ironic story-driven RPG with humorous dialogue-puzzles in the style of Monkey Island.

reviewHighlights.text: 도전과제 때문에 했는데 정말 힘들었다. 이 제작사의 게임은 시간이 지나도 나아지는게 없다. 도전과제 100% 하는데 12시간이 걸렸다. 한줄요약: 하지마시오.
